Title: etcd vulnerable to TOCTOU of gateway endpoint authentication
Description:
The vulnerability was spotted due to unclear documentation of how the gateway handles endpoints validation. 

### Detail
The gateway only authenticates endpoints detected from DNS SRV records, and it only authenticates the detected endpoints once.
AffectedVersions: All versions before 3.3.23, all versions starting from 3.4.0 before 3.4.10
NotImpacted: All versions starting from 3.3.23 before 3.4.0, all versions starting from 3.4.10
